titles.title: A resolution calling for the global repeal of blasphemy, heresy, and apostasy laws.
A resolution calling for the global repeal of blasphemy, heresy, and apostasy laws.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: Calls for: (1) for the global repeal of blasphemy, heresy, and apostasy laws; and (2) the United States to make the repeal of these laws a priority in the bilateral relationships of the United States with countries that have such laws.
